text: There is a api_token key and its value in the snippet pasted by you. Please edit it out if it is a sensitive one.

Hi everyone! Does someone have *any experience with creating a workflow/script that associates files in HubSpot with correct data object (contact/company/custom)?*

We are planning to do an initial import of data in HubSpot and then try to associate documents later, based on common key. If someone had any experience with it, I would appreciate you sharing it :slightly_smiling_face: Thank you!

Depending on the size of your dataset -> import all objects (full data), then export all data (HubSpot ID, your common keys fields per object), then join in Excel and import the resulting associations files

You can also do it by the API, but if it’s a one-off migration task, it will be a lot more efficient to do it manually :slightly_smiling_face:
Does anyone know if you can update HubSpot stored keys through the api in custom code?
